messages.subject: Shinshinto Taikan for sale
messages.msgSnippet: All, I have an excellent 2 volume set of the Shinshinto Taikan for sale, in beautiful condition, with dust jackets ( boxes ) and silk covers. Asking $600 +
messages.messageBody:
All, I have an excellent 2 volume set of the Shinshinto Taikan for sale,
in beautiful condition, with dust jackets ( boxes ) and silk covers.
Asking $600 + shipping. Anyone interested, please email off list.

Cheers

Richard Turner


--
Richard Turner
Nihontô Message Board <http://members5.boardhost.com/Nihon-To/>
